blog.name: elisaphoenix13
blog.title: Elisa
blog.description: Female, 26, and sneezing out fanfiction one after the other for your entertainment. (paypal.me/elisaphoenix13) The start of the Mama Bear Stephen Strange revolution.

summary:
*Peter throws junk food in the cart*
Stephen: ...Peter...
Peter: You said I could get whetever I want! 
Tony: You eat like an...
body:
*Peter throws junk food in the cart*

Stephen: …Peter…

Peter: You said I could get whetever I want!

Tony: You eat like an eight-year-old!

Peter: At least I’m not picky like one!

Stephen: That’s true.

Tony: You’re our own personal human garbage disposal.

summary: Run {3}
title: Run {3}
body:
pairing: peter parker / spiderman x reader 

warnings: language and violence mostly 

a/n: this may be short, and let me know if i missed anything!! enjoy!!

-

You were in that state of comatose. Nothing could wake you up, your eyes never opened. Almost like you were dead, but your chest still rose and fell like it always had.

He never came to check on you anymore. Ever since the incident you’ve rarely seen him or even felt him. You felt even more empty than you had before, and you were hollow before being kidnapped.

This was dangerous. Any moment you could die, and that sounded like such a horrible cliche, even as your life. Even breathing was starting to hurt. You wished your body would just give up already, stop delaying the fact that you were going to die.

What would he do with your body? Did you want to know? You didn’t care at this point. You wanted to stop hurting. Make the pain go away.

You heard the door. Someone or something was trying to get in, and as much as you were scared; and as much as you didn’t want to care- you became still in your bed. You refused to move. Refused to even look at that wooden door and see whoever would come in.

Your heart fell when the door actually did open. The spider man entered the room, climbing on top of the ceiling with such precision you wondered if he snuck into the facility like that, or if he went around everywhere like this.

He crawled down, landing beside you on the floor, leaning over to touch your skin lightly. He froze every time a sound came from down the hall, forcing him to stop and look over his shoulder.

The spider man touched your skin, wincing at how awful you felt and looked, like his heart was physically aching for your health. You didn’t have any emotion left to react when he picked you up and carried you over his shoulders. You didn’t have any fear when he rushed down the steps, what normally would’ve scared you to death.

It was all you could do to not cry. Anything– death even. You knew it wasn’t a reasonable option but it was still an option nonetheless.

“Where are you going?” the voice stuttered angrily, and you knew in your pained gut exactly who that voice belonged to. You haven’t heard him in so long.

The spider man didn’t reply. He kept walking, keeping you close to him. .

He stepped backward suddenly, as if the man of blue had lunged for him. You heard him let out a little squeal–terrified to death really–and he held onto your body even tighter.

The spider man was nimble, crawling up the wall with you over his shoulder, one hand around your waist and the other keeping him steady as he stuck to the surface.

The man of blue shot at him, growling loudly when he continued to miss, the bullets connecting into the drywall beside you both. “How did you even get in here?” He screamed. “I killed you!”

“Obviously you didn’t!” The spider man yelled back, his grip tight around your waist. You were slightly worried about the bullets catching your body parts that were flailing around, limp and numb. Would you even feel those bullets enter your skin? Would you even feel the blood draining from your wounds?

“Damn you, Spider-Man!” The man of blue stutter after him, multiple shots ringing out behind the two of them as the spider man spun out the window, webs shooting out from his wrists as you two flew through the city.

It’s been forever since you’ve seen lights. City lights. Windows that show your reflection, and your eyes widened as much as they could. Your bones were pretty much see-through, skin pale white. You stared at yourself every time you two passed a series of windows.

He didn’t plan on dropping you. His arms slipped and you tumbled to the ground with a sickening thud. Your eyes went black after that; certain that you’re in some kind of coma or pre-death.

The silence stuttered before you.

Where do you think you’re going?

blog.name: interstellarflowers
blog.title: hana
blog.description: ask box open || look at my about me if you wanna know about me haha

tags: peter parker i want you to know
summary: i want you to know | peter parker x reader | series teaser
title: i want you to know | peter parker x reader | series teaser
body:
a/n hey everyone, i’ve been feeling some kind of way so this series is me projecting a little oops, but yknow what they say about writing; take what you know best and put that shit to use. this is a teaser for a series that im dropping the first part of on june 18th 2019** (date changed) so stay in tune if youre interested

t/w this is sad, sorry

Everything happens for a reason. That’s the truth, right? Well, regardless of if it’s true or not, that seemed to be all you’ve heard as of late.

“Everything happens for a reason.”

“It gets better.”

“He would want you to move on.”

Would he?

It’s a tricky thing trying to tell the living what the deceased would’ve wanted. Especially when nobody knew the deceased better than you did.

He was so brave. He was so smart. He was gone too soon.

You’ll miss everything about him, and so would the world.

a/n edited for a change of plans in my plot

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

Maren | 20 | Norway

summary: i’m a sucker for Peter Parker whump caused by his spider mutation. Peter having a reaction to peppermint, caffeine or lavender?...
body:
i’m a sucker for Peter Parker whump caused by his spider mutation. Peter having a reaction to peppermint, caffeine or lavender? yesss. shitty thermoregulation? bring it on. Going into hibernation? LOVE IT.

fic recs are appreciated bc damn it’s my favorite trope, but not easy to find by filters.

summary: Honestly the thing I'm probably most excited for for far from home is literally just seeing Spider-Man do things. like literally...
body: Honestly the thing I’m probably most excited for for far from home is literally just seeing Spider-Man do things. like literally him just like swinging around the city or fighting some bad guys. I’m all for the storyline but those little small bits of action I have a true appreciation for. Probably just because Spider-Man has so much character when he does it. That has to be one of my main reasons for loving the character so much.

summary: Dont know if it came through before so i'm sending again by precotion.  So for the irondad time out thing, i was talking about a...
question: Dont know if it came through before so i'm sending again by precotion.  So for the irondad time out thing, i was talking about a 5yo peter. 🧡
answer:
Thank you for the clear up!

~

Peter sniffles and cries, crossing his little arms over his chest.

Tony has to stop himself from smiling. How is his son always so cute? It just isn’t fair. It makes him not want to punish the boy. But the kid needs to learn–going into daddy’s lab is dangerous and he can’t do it. 

Peter pouts more, looking behind him at his daddy.

Tony forms a scowl on his face. “Nuh-uh. You still have-” He checks his watch, “-15 minutes of your time out left.”

Peter sniffles more, pouting his lower lip out.

Tony tsks. “I’ve told you not to go into my lab, Petey. You knew the rules sweetheart.” He scolds.

Peter sniffles. “I just missed you, daddy.” he cries,

Tony melts, picking Peter up and holding him in his lap. “Aw, Peter… I’m sorry darling. I didn’t mean to stay that long. I’m so sorry.”

Peter sniffles and hugs his daddy, nuzzling his neck. “I just want to be with you daddy, don’t leave me so long.”

Tony kisses the top of his head, nodding slowly. “Alright doll, I’ll play with you right now even.” He promises.

Peter beams and bounces excitedly on his lap. “Hide and seek?”

Tony smiles and lets him down. “You go hide darling, I’ll count to 20!” Tony smiles as his son squeals and runs to hide. He closes his eyes and starts to count. He really does need to watch his time in the lab.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive of Our Own under the tag Peter Parker. The stories are automatically posted here from the RSS feed.

summary: We'll Never Be Worlds Apart
title: We'll Never Be Worlds Apart
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2InKWJY

by Megantasy

Peter can’t accept the death of Tony Stark. He feels like his world is missing a crucial part and he can’t bare to live without it. So when he has the idea of travelling to an alternate universe where no one returned after Thanos used the infinity stones, he realises that he has a chance of reuniting with his friends and maybe even change the world.

(This summary is crap but hey, it’s hard to summarise a story you haven’t finished yet. Contains a male x male relationship, if you don’t like it then don’t read it. Also, just so we’re clear, Peter is 18 in this so nothing gets weird with underage stuff)

  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Happy Hogan, Thanos (Marvel), Clint Barton
  • Relationships: Peter Parker/Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Marvel Universe, Avengers: Endgame (Movie) Spoilers, Male Homosexuality, Alternate Universe, Alternate Ending

summary: The Ancient Ones
title: The Ancient Ones
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IpacQ9

by Clover_Everoak

The Avengers have failed to go back in time to get the stones. Captain America found and stole the mind stone, but he threw it out a window on a whim, and accidentally wakes up Primordial. This results in the world getting a lot of help. A side effect? well, the Grandmaster fears even the minor gods for a pretty good reason.
